Title: Extends provisions of law relating to monitor of the Wyandanch union free school district
Summary: Extends provisions of law relating to monitor of the Wyandanch union free school district from June 30, 2025 until June 30, 2030.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 18 of the laws of 2020 authorizing the commissioner of education, in consultation with the comptroller to appoint a monitor to oversee the Wyandanch union free school district and establishing the powers and duties of the monitor, in relation to extending the provisions thereof
